title: The OCF Tag manifest schema
description: Primitive, that holds the JSONSchema which describes that Type. It’s also used for validation. There are core and custom Types. Type can be also a composition of other Types.

spec.title: The spec schema
spec.description: A container for the Tag specification definition.

additionalRefs.title: List of the full path of additional parent nodes the Tag is attached to.
additionalRefs.description: List of the full path of additional parent nodes the Tag is attached to. The parent nodes MUST reside under “cap.core.tag” or “cap.tag” subtree. The connection means that the Tag becomes a child of the referenced parent nodes. In a result, the Tag has multiple parents.

items.title: Full path of additional parent nodes the Tag is attached to.
